ERROR_BROWSER_SOLUTION: Install a new browser to explore in 3D.
ERROR_MAINTENANCE_SOLUTION: Please come back in a few minutes.
ERROR_MISSING_URLS_EXPLANATION: This is an older model. The website owner may have a new model on the way.
ERROR_MISSING_URLS_PROBLEM: Oops, there are no panoramas for this model.
ERROR_WEBGL_IOS_SOLUTION: Upgrade to iOS 8 or higher to explore in 3D.
HELP_DESKTOP_360_2A: Click the Inside View icon to enter the Space.
HELP_DESKTOP_360_2B: Or, press the number 1 key to enter Inside View.
HELP_DESKTOP_DOLLHOUSE_1A: Left click and drag left, right, up, and down to rotate the Dollhouse.
HELP_DESKTOP_DOLLHOUSE_1B: Or, use the arrow keys to rotate the Dollhouse.
HELP_DESKTOP_DOLLHOUSE_2A: Right click and drag left, right, up, and down to change the Dollhouse position on screen.
HELP_DESKTOP_DOLLHOUSE_3A: Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_1A: Left click and drag left, right, up, and down to change the Floorplan position on screen.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_2A: Right click and drag left or right to rotate the Floorplan.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_2B: Or, use the arrow keys to rotate left or right.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_3A: Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_3B: Or, use the arrow keys to zoom in and out.
HELP_DESKTOP_FLOORPLAN_B: Click to view the floor plan of the Space
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_360_B: Click 360 Views in the Highlight Reel to view outdoor scenes.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_DOLLHOUSE_B: Click to view and rotate a top-down view of the entire Space in 3D.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_FLOORS_B: Switch between floors in the Space.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_HLR_B: Open to navigate through the Space using thumbnail images.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_INSIDE_B: Click to explore inside the Space.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_MATTERTAG_B: Click or hover over for information about features in the Space.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_TOUR_B: Play, pause, and navigate forward and backward through a Guided Tour.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_VR_B: Click to launch the Space in virtual reality.
HELP_DESKTOP_MORE_ZOOM_B: Use these controls to zoom in and out or use the scroll wheel.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_1A: Click and Drag to look around the Space.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_1B: Or, use the arrow keys to turn left and right.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_2A: Click on the rings throughout the space to move around.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_2B: Or, use the arrow keys to move forward and back.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_3A: Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
HELP_DESKTOP_PANORAMA_3B: Or, use the plus and minus keys to zoom in and out.
HELP_MOBILE_3: Use a pinch gesture to zoom in and out.
HELP_MOBILE_360_2: Tap the Inside View icon to enter the Space.
HELP_MOBILE_DOLLHOUSE_1: Touch and drag up, down, left, and right to rotate the Dollhouse.
HELP_MOBILE_DOLLHOUSE_2: Touch and drag with two fingers to position the Dollhouse.
HELP_MOBILE_FLOORPLAN_1: Touch and drag to position the Floorplan.
HELP_MOBILE_FLOORPLAN_2: Touch and drag with two fingers to rotate the Floorplan.
HELP_MOBILE_FLOORPLAN_B: Tap to view the floor plan of the Space
HELP_MOBILE_MORE_360_B: Tap 360 Views in the Highlight Reel to view outdoor scenes.
HELP_MOBILE_MORE_DOLLHOUSE_B: Tap to view and rotate a top-down view of the entire Space in 3D.
HELP_MOBILE_MORE_INSIDE_B: Tap to explore inside the Space.
HELP_MOBILE_MORE_MATTERTAG_B: Tap for information about features in the Space.
HELP_MOBILE_MORE_VR_B: Tap to launch the Space in virtual reality.
HELP_MOBILE_PANORAMA_1: Touch and Drag to look around the Space.
HELP_MOBILE_PANORAMA_2: Tap on the rings throughout the Space to move around.
LINK_ALERT_COPY: Please use CTRL/CMD + C to copy.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_CLICK_ANYWHERE: Click anywhere to add points and draw lines.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_DRAG_EDIT: Drag to edit the current point
MEASUREMENT_HELP_ESCAPE: Press ESC to start a new line. Press ESC twice to exit.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_MODAL_BODY_1: Measurement accuracy is not guaranteed, and varies depending on the camera used and capture conditions.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_MODAL_BODY_2: Verify your measurements by viewing them from multiple angles.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_MODAL_SUB_HEADER: Get more out of your space
MEASUREMENT_HELP_PRESS_END: Press and hold to add your end point, and complete a line.
MEASUREMENT_HELP_PRESS_START: Press and hold to add your start point
MEASUREMENT_NUDGE_MESSAGE: You can measure anything in this space. Try it out!
MEASUREMENT_START_ADDING: Click the + button to start a measurement
SC_LOCKOUT_MESSAGE: Sorry, but we had to lock you out of this space for a period of time due to too many unsuccessful password attempts. Try again in a few minutes.
SC_PASSWORD_TITLE:
Viewing this space
 requires a password
SHARE_ERROR_SWEEP_DISABLED: This 3D Scan is hidden and cannot be shared.

TAGS.EMPTY_LIST_MESSAGE: You don't have any tags yet.
TAGS.MULTI_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: There are no Mattertags on this floor.
TAGS.SINGLE_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You don't have any Mattertags yet.

TERMS_FAIL: Could not fetch terms. Please make sure you have an internet connection to view the terms of use.

TOOLS.BLUR_HELP_MESSAGE: Use the Blur tool to hide sensitive information that may be visible in your space
TOOLS.HLR_HELP_MESSAGE: Use the Highlight Reel to guide visitors to the most important locations in your Space.
TOOLS.LABELS_HELP_MESSAGE: Labels are short descriptions you can associate with a room in a Space.
TOOLS.MATTERTAGS_HELP_MESSAGE: Mattertags are a great way to call out features, provide additional details, and add context to a Space.
TOOLS.MEASUREMENTS_HELP_MESSAGE: Measure anything in your Space, then publish your measurements to Showcase for your visitors.
TOOLS.PHOTOS_HELP_MESSAGE: Take high resolution photos of your Space, and download them to use on websites or in print.
TOOLS.SCANS_3D_HELP_MESSAGE: Your viewers navigate the Space via the scans. Sometimes you might want to hide certain scans for a better viewing experience.
TOOLS.START_LOCATION_HELP_MESSAGE: The Start Location is where your viewers start the immersive experience.
TOOLS.VIEW_360_HELP_MESSAGE: 360° Views are a great way of showing off the outside of a Space. Drag them to the map to place them in the right spot.
TOOLS.VR_PATH_HELP_MESSAGE: Edit the VR Path to control where users can navigate in Virtual Reality.

VR_APP_INSTRUCT: Click the button below to switch to VR, then place the phone inside your Google Cardboard
VR_APP_RECCOMMENDED: For a more premium VR experience, we highly recommend Oculus Quest.
VR_SUPPORTS: We also support Oculus Go, and other modern headsets that include controllers

ACCORDION.BATCH_DELETE_MODAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete %{number} %{itemType}?

APP_SWITCH.UNSUPPORTED_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Please use Chrome, Safari, Firefox or Edge to enable edit mode.
APP_SWITCH.UNSUPPORTED_TOOLTIP_TITLE: Edit mode is not supported on this browser
APP_SWITCH.PUBLIC_PUBLISH_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Anyone with the link will see the changes you've made.
APP_SWITCH.PRIVATE_PUBLISH_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Your collaborators (if any) will see the changes you've made.
APP_SWITCH.REVERT_CHANGES_MODAL_HEADER: You can revert unpublished changes made by you and other collaborators.
APP_SWITCH.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_CHANGES_ERROR_MESSAGE: We were unable to save your changes. You may have to publish to keep the data you have entered.
APP_SWITCH.UNABLE_TO_PUBLISH_CHANGES_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, we're having trouble publishing your changes. Please try again in a few minutes.
APP_SWITCH.UNABLE_TO_REVERT_CHANGES_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, we're having trouble reverting your changes. Please try again in a few minutes.
APP_SWITCH.UNAUTHORIZED_ERROR_MESSAGE: You do not have permission to save changes to this space. Please make sure you are logged in.

BLURS.ALREADY_PROCESSING_ALERT_MESSAGE: A blur cannot be deleted since it's already processing.
BLURS.BRUSH_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Adjust your brush size with this slider.
BLURS.CREATE_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Click here to add your first blur area in this space.
BLURS.MULTI_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: There are no blurs on this floor.
BLURS.SINGLE_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You don't have any blurs yet.
BLURS.HELP_TOOL_MESSAGE: Use the Blur tool to hide sensitive information that may be visible in your space
BLURS.OVERLAY_MESSAGE: Use your mouse to paint the areas you want blurred. Hit ESC to stop drawing.
BLURS.APPLY_MODAL_MESSAGE: This will apply %{blurs} to %{scans} in the model. It will take a few minutes until the blurs are fully applied and securely hiding the blurred objects.
BLURS.APPLY_MODAL_WARNING: Once applied, blurs you created will no longer be editable
BLURS.UNABLE_TO_SAVE_CHANGES_ERROR_MESSAGE: We were unable to save your changes. Please try again in a few minutes.
BLURS.UNABLE_TO_APPLY_BLURS_ERROR_MESSAGE: Oops! Something went wrong and the blurs could not be applied. Please try again in a few minutes.
BLURS.UNAUTHORIZED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, you do not have permission to apply blurs to this model. Are you logged in?

HLR.ADD_HIGHLIGHT_INSTRUCTIONS: Navigate to a visible scan in the main areas in your Space. Click this button to add to your Highlight Reel.
HLR.CLEAR_HLR_MODAL_TITLE: Are you sure you want to clear all the highlights from your Highlight Reel?
HLR.TRANSITION_AFTER_360_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Transitions after a 360° View are not customizable.
HLR.TRANSITION_IS_360_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Transitions for 360° Views are not customizable.
HLR.TRANSITION_SAME_SWEEP_DISABLED_MESSAGE: Transitions from the same scan are not customizable.
HLR.TRANSITION_NO_ROTATION_DISABLED_MESSAGE: No rotation occurs on floor plan highlights.

LABELS.MOBILE_OVERLAY_MESSAGE: Press and hold to add your label
LABELS.ADD_LABEL_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Click the + button to add a label
LABELS.MULTI_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: There are no labels on this floor.
LABELS.SINGLE_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You don't have any labels yet.

MATTERTAGS.SINGLE_FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: You don't have any Mattertags yet.

MATTERTAGS.MOBILE_OVERLAY_MESSAGE: Press and hold to add your Mattertag

MODAL.SAVING_ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, we're having trouble saving your changes. Please try again in a few minutes.

PHOTOS.ERROR_MODAL_MESSAGE: Sorry, something went wrong while capturing the photo. Please try again.

SCANS.NO_HIDE_LIST_ITEM_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: To hide this scan, you need to first change the Start Location.
SCANS.HLR_LIST_ITEM_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: This scan is part of the Highlight Reel.
SCANS.START_LOCATION_LIST_ITEM_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: This is the Start Location of the Space.
SCANS.FLOOR_EMPTY_MESSAGE: There are no Scans on this floor.
SCANS.START_LOCATION_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: To hide this scan, you need to first change the Start Location.
SCANS.REMOVE_HLR_MODAL_MESSAGE: The selected scan (Scan %{number}) is part of the Highlight Reel.
SCANS.REMOVE_HLR_MODAL_BATCH_MESSAGE: %{smart_count} Scan will be removed from the Highlight Reel. |||| %{smart_count} Scans will be removed from the Highlight Reel.
SCANS.REMOVE_HLR_MODAL_WARNING: At least one scan needs to be in a Highlight Reel. The Highlight Reel will be removed if you hide the associated scan. |||| At least one scan needs to be in a Highlight Reel. The Highlight Reel will be removed if you hide the associated scans.
SCANS.REMOVE_SCAN_FROM_HLR_MODAL_MESSAGE: The selected scan (Scan %{number}) is part of the Highlight Reel and will be removed from the Highlight Reel.
SCANS.REMOVE_BATCH_FROM_HLR_MODAL_SCANS_MESSAG: %{smart_count} scan is a part of the highlight reel. |||| %{smart_count} scans are a part of the highlight reel.
SCANS.REMOVE_BATCH_FROM_HLR_MODAL_HIGHLIGHTS_M: %{smart_count} highlight will be removed from the Highlight Reel. |||| %{smart_count} highlights will be removed from the Highlight Reel.

SETTINGS.HIDE_LABELS_IN_DOLLHOUSE_OPTION: View the labels you placed in Floor Plan only
SETTINGS.SHOW_SAVED_MEASUREMENTS_OPTION: Measure your space & view your measurements
SETTINGS.UNITS_HEADER: Set the Measurement Units for this Space
SETTINGS.UNITS_SUBHEADER: Applies only to Schematic Floor Plans. Visitors can change their units while viewing measurements.
SETTINGS.TOUR_AND_HLR_HEADER: Choose the Tour & Highlight Reel Settings for your Space
SETTINGS.HLR_OPTION_MESSAGE: Visitors can see the Highlight Reel.
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_HEADER: Customize what your visitors can see and do
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_DOLLHOUSE_MESSAGE: Visitors can see the Dollhouse View, a unique 3D perspective of your space.
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_FLOORPLAN_MESSAGE: Visitors can see the Floor Plan View, a top-down perspective of your space.
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_ROOM_LABELS_MESSAGE: Visitors can see the labels you placed.
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_FLOOR_SELECTION_MESSAGE: Visitors can change floors in your space.
SETTINGS.ADVANCED_MEASUREMENT_MODE_MESSAGE: Allow visitors to measure your space.
SETTINGS.PRESENTATION_HEADER: Choose how you want your Space to be presented

START_LOCATION.HIDDEN_SWEEP_MESSAGE: This scan is currently hidden and cannot be set as a Start Location.
START_LOCATION.UNPLACED_360_MESSAGE: This 360º View is not yet placed and cannot be set as a Start Location.
START_LOCATION.ENABLED_MESSAGE: Click this once you've found the desired view for your Start Location.

VIEWS_360.ROTATE_TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: Click to rotate the 360° View and align it to the space

VR.TOAST_MESSAGE: Some scans cannot be reached from the start position. To fix this, enable more scans near the area.
